user_query: I want to receive a curated daily newsletter with the top news stories from Alarabiya, France24 Arabic, and CNN Arabic.

TaskList.description: Retrieve top news stories from Alarabiya, including headlines, content, images, and source names.
Retrieve top news stories from France24 Arabic, including headlines, content, images, and source names.
Retrieve top news stories from CNN Arabic, including headlines, content, images, and source names.
Compile the news stories from Alarabiya, France24 Arabic, and CNN Arabic into a single curated newsletter.
Send the compiled newsletter to the user's email subscription list.
